name: Cirno's Frost Trap
description:
This tiny game was made for Cirno Day(9/9/2019). 

Cirno is once again confronted by an endless swarm of frogs. Use the frost bombs along with the narrow paths to turn their numbers against them. Weak green frogs blasted by frost bombs roll away with great force crushing any hapless frogs behind them.

Controls:

  • Left/Right=Move
  • Z=Toss frost bomb
  • X=Jump
  • Enter=Pause
  • M=Toggle mute

Touhou Project and it's characters(as well as music compositions) belongs to ZUN.
